data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Saint Paul Charlestown.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Paul Charlestown, Saint Kitts and Nevis
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Saint Paul Charlestown, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 1,340 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 418 believers in Saint Paul Charlestown, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, help the 418 believers in Saint Paul Charlestown to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,482 lost friends and neighbors.
Spirit, help the 418 believers in Saint Paul Charlestown to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 1,900 people living in Saint Paul Charlestown through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.focus_label: Saint Paul Charlestown, Saint Kitts and Nevis
data.section_summary:
the state of Saint Paul Charlestown, Saint Kitts and Nevis has a population of 1,900.

We estimate Saint Paul Charlestown has 418 people who might know Jesus, 1,340 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 142 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.full_name: Saint Paul Charlestown, Saint Kitts and Nevis
